name: MoonCake's Adventure
description:
In many Asia countries, there is a festival called the Mid-Autumn Festival or Mooncake Festival, and it's the second-most important holiday after Lunar New Year. On this day, at night, the moon is believed that in the brightest and fullest size. In many countries in Asia, there was a belief that there are rabbits that live on the moon. That's why the game story was about the rabbit that from the moon help the people to make the mooncake to prepare for the festival.

Control:

- WASD or arrow key to move, use E to interact with the people.

Your goal is to help them to make a great moon cake on this day.
